example.code:
PS C:\> New-EC2VPC -CidrBlock 10.0.0.0/16
CidrBlock : 10.0.0.0/16 DhcpOptionsId : dopt-1a2b3c4d InstanceTenancy : default IsDefault : False State : pending Tags : {} VpcId : vpc-12345678
example.description: This example creates a VPC with the specified CIDR. Amazon VPC also creates the following for the VPC: a default DHCP options set, a main route table, and a default network ACL.
